definition: surname Yin/dynasty name at the end the Shang dynasty, after their move to Yinxu 殷墟 in modern Henan province

sentences.english: He lived a kind of superior living conditions in his early years.
sentences.chinese: 張岱出生於世宦之家，家境殷實，早年生活條件優越。

sentences.english: In recent years, however, a number of substantial objections have been raised.
sentences.chinese: 然而，在最近幾年，幾個殷實的反對意見了。

sentences.english: Mr. Knight's access to classes may have something to do with his pocketbook.
sentences.chinese: 奈特能來上課跟他殷實的荷包可能有點關係。

sentences.english: Hold like rich garners the full ripened grain;
sentences.chinese: 沒能像殷實的穀倉儲藏着飽滿的穀粒。

sentences.english: Their lifestyle could seem Spartan to a city family with their assets .
sentences.chinese: 他們的生活對城市裏的殷實人家來說似乎過於嚴樸。

sentences.english: August brings the sheaves of corn , then the harvest home is borne .
sentences.chinese: 八月帶來成捆的穀物，家家戶戶殷實富足。

definition: not having to worry about clothes and food (idiom)/to be provided with the basic necessities
offspring a famous family (idiom); good breeding/blue blood
to have lost both one's parents
to adopt/to give for adoption (usually to a childless relative)
